name: getGlyphs(in:glyphs:characterIndexes:glyphInscriptions:elasticBits:)
desc: Extracts the information needed to lay out the glyphs in the given glyph buffer from the given glyph range.
declaration:
func getGlyphs(in glyphsRange: NSRange, 
        glyphs glyphBuffer: UnsafeMutablePointer<NSGlyph>!, 
characterIndexes charIndexBuffer: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>!, 
glyphInscriptions inscribeBuffer: UnsafeMutablePointer<NSGlyphInscription>!, 
   elasticBits elasticBuffer: UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>!) -> Int
